thread.title: Jade

author: Jade
title: Jade
text: After discovering our main car had a flat tyre yesterday, and flapping around looking for tyres and or someone to fit it before Monday my husband found yourselves. We booked online and were kept up to date with what was happening. Our Fitter Daniel J was fantastic, very polite and happy to chat, very quick service, highly recommended will definitely be using you again, And any of our friends and family will be encouraged to do the same. Thank you
